title: Practical Training Utilizing VR-Based Visual Function Training Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of visual systems and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Enhancing operational and analytical capabilities of visual training systems using VR devices in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Perform visual function assessments using AI-based iris and pupil tracking technology in a VR environment.
Design personalized visual training programs and apply processes for analyzing individual treatment effectiveness.
Establish and manage prevention/treatment plans based on visual impairment diagnostic data.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
